headline: The Role of Exxon Mobil Corporation (XOM) in a Diversified Dividend Stock Portfolio
summary: Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE:XOM) is included among the Best Stocks for a Dividend Stock Portfolio. Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE:XOM) stands as a global powerhouse in liquefied natural gas (LNG), with stakes in multiple projects worldwide that collectively produce around 23 million tons annually. Its portfolio includes major interests in Gorgon LNG, Papua New Guinea LNG, […]
